customOperator.baseValue: if (is(iA1>=0)=true) then mSignA1:maOperator("+") else mSignA1:maOperator("-"); if (is(iA2>=0)=true) then mSignA2:maOperator("+") else mSignA2:maOperator("-"); if (is(iA3>=0)=true) then mSignA3:maOperator("+") else mSignA3:maOperator("-"); if (is(iAns1>=0)=true) then mSignAns1:maOperator("+") else mSignAns1:maOperator("-"); if (is(iA1>=0)=true) then mSignA1:maOperator("+") else mSignA11:maOperator("-"); if (is(iA2>=0)=true) then mSignA2:maOperator("+") else mSignA21:maOperator("-"); if (is(iA3>=0)=true) then mSignA3:maOperator("+") else mSignA31:maOperator("-"); if (is(iAns1>=0)=true) then mSignAns1:maOperator("+") else mSignAns11:maOperator("-");

itemBody.p:

x
log b
y
where y has the smallest possible value.
